CodeChunks.CodeChunk: BagSlot toDiscard = InventoryManager.FilledInventoryAndArmory.First(x => x.RawItemId == 31741); if (toDiscard != null && toDiscard.IsFilled) LlamaLibrary.Extensions.BagSlotExtensions.Discard(toDiscard);
